== Main inclusion report for libgpod ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libg/libgpod/, compiled on all arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' Build-Depends/Depends for rhythmbox

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* No binaries.
* Unsafe g_malloc() calls.

4. ''QA:''
* Only a library
* Bugs: package not in Debian

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* FHS met.
* Debian policy met.
* Standard CDBS packaging.
